tweetSentenceList.constTree: (ROOT (S (NP (PRP I)) (VP (VBP love) (NP (NP (DT the) (NN excitement)) (PP (IN of) (S (VP (VBG opening) (PRT (RP up)) (NP (NP (DT a) (JJ new) (NNP Apple) (NN product)) (PP (IN for) (NP (DT the) (JJ first) (NN time))))))))) (. !)))
